hanzi-su-wiki:
店

Значения

Лавка, магазин

Мнемоника

  • Навес 广 для защиты гадателей 占 от непогоды. По такому же образцу стали строить лавки, магазины и т.д.

  • В магазине помидоры (トマト) лежат на прилавке.

Варианты

坫

jp_example_words:
店(てん): store, shop, establishment
支店(してん): branch store (office)
商店(しょうてん): shop, business firm
書店(しょてん): bookstore
売店(ばいてん): shop, stand
店屋(みせや): store, shop
洋品店(ようひんてん): shop which handles Western-style apparel and accessories
店員(てんいん): salesclerk
喫茶店(きっさてん): coffee shop
店(みせ): store, shop, establishment
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A long time ago, someone put up a canopy over their fortune telling booth and created the first shop. This store was fortune-based, but since then lots of different stores have popped up!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the very first store in history. A fortune teller decided enough was enough, they should be in some kind of structure where it's safe, official looking, and more permanent.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This shop quickly turned into ten (てん) shops! It was a good idea, after all, so all of the other people selling goods and services decided to copy it and create their own shops. The next day there were ten more.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture ten shops, all made up of someone selling something under a canopy. The first one is the fortune teller, but the nine others are whatever you want them to be!
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 占 (しめる、うらなう、セン занимать, предсказывать), 点 (つける、テン точка).
Ru_Radicals: 卜 (гадание), 口 (рот), 广 (скала с точкой)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: occupying (占) under the stony cliff (广) is a shop
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Try to remember all those stores from Zelda that were inside caves and had fortune-teller like vendors.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Guang " to " Accounting ", the original meaning is the warehouse where goods are placed. Jin Cuibao's "Annotation of Ancient and Modern: Capital City": "Si, so the things of Chenhuo Fu; shop, so the goods of the shopping Fu are also. Si, Chen Ye; the shop, the home."

" Shop " can mean a store. "Discussion on the Law of the Tang Dynasty‧Famous Example Four‧The Equalizer": "The place of residence is the mansion, and the place of sale is the shop."

" Shop " also means a hotel. Tang Wen Tingyun "Shangshan Morning Trip": "The sound of chickens at Maodian month, and people in Banqiaoshuang."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Guang " to " Accounting ", the original meaning is the warehouse where goods are placed.
humanum_full_description:
從「广」，「占」聲，本義為放置貨物的棧房。晉崔豹《古今注‧都邑》：「肆，所以陳貨鬻之物也；店，所以置貨鬻之物也。肆，陳也；店，置也。」

　　「店」可表示商店。《唐律疏議‧名例四‧平贓者》：「居物之處為邸，沽賣之所為店。」

　　「店」還表示旅店。唐溫庭筠〈商山早行〉：「雞聲茅店月，人跡板橋霜。」
humanum_short_description: 從「广」，「占」聲，本義為放置貨物的棧房。

從「 广 」，「 占 」聲，本義為放置貨物的棧房。晉崔豹《古今注‧都邑》：「肆，所以陳貨鬻之物也；店，所以置貨鬻之物也。肆，陳也；店，置也。」 「 店 」可表示商店。《唐律疏議‧名例四‧平贓者》：「居物之處為邸，沽賣之所為店。」 「 店 」還表示旅店。唐溫庭筠〈商山早行〉：「雞聲茅店月，人跡板橋霜。」
From the sound of " Guang" to " Accounting", the original meaning is the warehouse where goods are placed. Jin Cuibao's "Annotation of Ancient and Modern: Capital City": "Si, so the things of Chenhuo Fu; shop, so the goods of the shopping Fu are also. Si, Chen Ye; the shop, the home." " Shop" can mean a store. "Discussion on the Law of the Tang Dynasty‧Famous Example Four‧The Equalizer": "The place of residence is the mansion, and the place of sale is the shop." " Shop" also means a hotel. Tang Wen Tingyun "Shangshan Morning Trip": "The sound of chickens at Maodian month, and people in Banqiaoshuang."

店字的基本解释

店
diàn
售卖货物的铺子：店铺。店员。店主。店肆。店堂。商店。书店。
旅馆：客店。旅店。

店字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diàn］
［《廣韻》都念切，去，端。］
(1)放置货物的栈房。
(2)商店。
(3)旅店，客店。
(4)犹“站”。常用作集镇之名。

店字的英文翻译

◎ 店
shop, store, inn

店字的康熙字典解释
店字的源字形

店字的起名意思

指商店，铺子，旅馆，客店。

形声字。广表意,其古文字像房屋形,表示店是用作商品买卖的房屋;占(zhan )表声,占是站的省文,站是古代商家用
来置放货物的土台子。本义是商店。

магазин
Пиктофонетические символы.
Гуаньи означает, что его древние символы напоминают дом, что указывает на то, что магазин - это дом, используемый для торговли товарами; чжань (чжань) - это провинциальный язык станции, а станция - это земляная платформа, используемая древними купцами для размещения товаров.
Первоначальное значение - магазин.
① Магазин; магазин: ~ член "ткань ~. ② гостевой магазин: путешествия ~" жить ~.

店

Значения

Лавка, магазин

Мнемоника

  • Навес 广 для защиты гадателей 占 от непогоды. По такому же образцу стали строить лавки, магазины и т.д.

  • В магазине помидоры (トマト) лежат на прилавке.

Варианты

坫

Radicals: 广, 占  (canopy, fortune)
Meaning Mnemonic
A long time ago, someone put up a canopy over their fortune telling booth and created the first shop. This store was fortune-based, but since then lots of different stores have popped up!
Picture the very first store in history. A fortune teller decided enough was enough, they should be in some kind of structure where it's safe, official looking, and more permanent.
Reading Mnemonic
This shop quickly turned into ten (てん) shops! It was a good idea, after all, so all of the other people selling goods and services decided to copy it and create their own shops. The next day there were ten more.
Picture ten shops, all made up of someone selling something under a canopy. The first one is the fortune teller, but the nine others are whatever you want them to be!
